description:
This course is designed to Help you to Pass the School Leaders Licensure Assessment (SLLA), using our easy step-by-step SLLA Exam study course without weeks and months of endless studying...

Our SLLA practice test questions give you the opportunity to test your knowledge on a set of questions. You can know everything that is going to be covered on the test and it will not do you any good on the day of the test if you have not had a chance to practice. Repetition is the key to success and using the practice test questions allows you to reinforce the strengths you already have, while improving the weaknesses that you need to overcome.

We partner with School Administration Students, Teacher Leaders and new and potential school administrators, who want additional study material to assist them in passing the School Leaders Licensure Assessment (SLLA) Exam. We provide a online SLLA prep course to help you prepare to take the School Leaders Licensure Assessment. Passage of this exam is mandatory in some states if you want to lead a Public or Charter school. The course includes an overview of the ISLLC standards, Practice Questions related to each standard, and additional videos and resources related to beginning school leaders. You should take this course if you want additional study material to help you prepare for the SLLA exam.

This course had additional Bonus material, Videos, Flashcards and White Papers that get you Prepared for the rewarding and satisfying career of School Leadership

This course should take 4 hours to complete, however it is suggested to continue to review the quiz questions until to achieve 80% or higher proficiency on each quiz.
title: SLLA Practice Prep
